trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Heltonville
There were no other sightings in Heltonville on or around August 24th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my front yard talking to my niece.We see so many strage lights here that im always looking up.I was looking up at the stars when this dark object first appeared from the fron part of the tree i was sitting next to.At first i thought it was just an optical illision,you could not see through it.I first realized it was no illision when it slowly silently passed ofer out little pool and you could see the pool reflecting off the bottom.As i watched it pass by an open area between my yard and the woods it reflected every thig under it but blocked out the sky.My guess is if you viewed this from above it reflected the sky.It was a very neat way to camo somethig theo only way you could see that there was an object there was because it blacked out the sky.It moved so slow but under inteligent control.Im sure it was no baloon before i deam anything unkown i rule out every possibilty.If i was not looking up at that exact moment i would not have witnessed it.all my niece could see was that the area i was pointing to was darker.I would be more than happy to talk to anyone about this just call if you get no answer just leave a message and i will return your call.
